entries.welcome.title: Welcome - Forge Modding Helper
entries.welcome.alert.delete: Are you sure you want to move this workspace to trash ?
entries.welcome.alert.refresh:
You are about to update the list of recent projects.
All projects whose folder cannot be found or cannot be accessed will be removed from the list.
This action is irreversible. Continue ?
entries.welcome.alert.import.error.unsupported: Error : workspace's Minecraft version is not supported by Forge Modding Helper. Importation canceled.
entries.assistant_creator.title: Assistant Creator - Forge Modding Helper
entries.assistant_creator.label.welcome: Welcome to the Minecraft Forge workspace creation wizard ! We will create for you a workspace with the settings which you will define in the next pages.
entries.assistant_creator.label.welcome.internet: You must be connected to Internet during all the creation process.
entries.assistant_creator.label.welcome.output_d: Select an output folder where the workspace will be generated :
entries.assistant_creator.label.step2.descriptio: Let's get started with basics information about your mod.
entries.assistant_creator.label.step3.descriptio: We need now some advanced details about your mod.
entries.assistant_creator.label.step4.descriptio: Choose the version wich you want to use.
entries.assistant_creator.label.step5.descriptio: You can here give optional details about your mod.
entries.assistant_creator.label.step6.descriptio: Perfect ! We now have all informations about your mod. So we will go to generate it workspace.
entries.assistant_creator.label.step6.internet: You must be connected to Internet during all the generation process.
entries.assistant_creator.label.step6.next_messa: Click on "Next" to generate your workspace.
entries.assistant_creator.label.finish.descripti:
Your workspace is ready !
You can now import it in your favourite IDE !
entries.assistant_creator.progress.downloading_f: Unable to retrive MDK of Minecraft Forge
entries.assistant_creator.progress.copy_mod_logo: Error : Unable to copy mod logo : "Unattainable file."
entries.assistant_creator.close_message: Are you sure you want to cancel the workspace creation ?
entries.assistant_creator.alert.no_connection:
Error : Unable to retrieve remote informations.
Please check your Internet connection.
entries.assistant_creator.alert.no_generator:
Error : Unable to find generator for this version.
Application will now closing.
entries.project_scan.wait_message: Please wait while your project is scanned...

entries.project_explorer.alert.import: Are you sure you want to import this %N element(s) ?
entries.project_explorer.alert.close: Are you sure you want to close this workspace ?
entries.project_explorer.mod_settings.updatejson: Link to the update json file
entries.project_explorer.mod_settings.unsaved_mo: Some modifications have been not saved !
entries.project_explorer.mod_settings.choose_log: Choose a logo for your mod.
entries.project_explorer.mod_settings.alerte.del: Are you sure you want to move the logo to trash ?
entries.project_explorer.translations.alert.dele: Are you sure you want to move this file to trash ?
